column2: I live for frights and terrors... You’re Mirage Keepers, right?
I hear that some Mirages are actually ghostly apparitions haunting the earth.
Can you bring me one of these delightful terrors?
I knew you wouldn’t let me down.
Bring me a ghostly Mirage... I’m so looking forward to it.
Hmph. Fine then. I’ll just have to search myself.
The scarier the better. I’ll be waiting.
Ahh! Th-that scared me! I never knew Mirages that terrifying existed.
This is for you... Take it. I had a great time. See you around... Heh ha ha!
